name: VelOcity (itch) (SPHI)
description:
VELOCITY

Velocity is a speed platformer centered around gaining max speed and rushing to the goal. You can use walls to change direction without loosing speed, and if you ever find yourself on a small platform with no speed built up you can generate speed on the spot.

Controls: Menu:

WSAD/Num 9 Num 3 Num 4 Num 6 - Select

Space/Num 8 - Confirm

Escape/Num 2 - Cancel

Game:

AD/Num 4 Num 6 - Move left/right

Space/Num 8 - Jump

Shift/Num 5 - Generate Speed

Escape/Num 2 - Pause Game

If you ever want do delete your save file you can just press delete on the main menu.

I apologize in advance for the short length/general lack of polish - I've only been able to work on this game for 4 out of the 9 days given in the game jam. 

Audio taken from the Trix sound pack in the jam's resource page.
